word_mean: 电流计：用电磁作用测量电流的仪器
检示或测量微小电流的仪表。

sentence.Network_en: The galvanometer indicated a voltage, then dropped to zero.
sentence.Network_cn: 这时,电流计指示出一个电压, 然后,指针又回了零.

sentence.Network_en: When the galvanometer reads zero the circuit is in the null - balance position.
sentence.Network_cn: 当检流计的读数为零时,电路处于零平衡位置.

sentence.Network_en: There is no current through the galvanometer.
